CommandTemplate.name: MySql Tables-Columns
CommandTemplate.Command: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA AS Catalog, '{catalog}' as TableSchema, TABLE_NAME as TableName, COLUMN_NAME as ColumnName, ORDINAL_POSITION AS OrdinalPosition, COLUMN_DEFAULT as DefaultValue, CASE WHEN IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsNullible, DATA_TYPE AS Datatype, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS MaxLength, NULL AS IsComputed, NULL AS ColumnLength, NULL AS IsIdentity, NULL AS IsRowGuidColumn, CASE WHEN COLUMN_KEY = 'PRI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsPrimaryKey, CASE WHEN COLUMN_KEY = 'MUL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsForeignKey, CASE WHEN COLUMN_KEY = 'UNI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS HasUniqueConstraint FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = '{catalog}' and TABLE_NAME like '%{tableName}%' ORDER BY TABLE_NAME, ORDINAL_POSITION
